rules_text:
Trample
When Remnant of the Wild enters, if you cast it, untap all lands you control.
flavor_text:
[i]“‘Leave here,' he ordered the hunters and woodsmen. ‘These woods are older than your people and sacred to me.'”
—Azamir, “Woodwrought Oath”[/i]
notes: fluffy: -dashgap, flavour bar up, comma>period in FT
